mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENTS (cm_id, bd_id, mem_id, cm_content, cm_date, cm_delny, cm_openny, cm_group, cm_id2) VALUES (#{cm_id},#{bd_id},'admin',DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(#{cm_content},4000,1),sysdate,'N',#{cm_openny},#{bd_id},null)
mapper.select: SELECT cm_id, bd_id, cm_group, mem_id, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(cm_content,4000,1) as cm_content, TO_CHAR(cm_date) as cm_date, cm_delny, cm_openny, cm_id2 FROM comments WHERE bd_id = #{bd_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE comments SET cm_delny = 'Y' WHERE cm_id=#{cm_id}
